name: Devil Dog
resistance: cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical weapons that aren’t silvered

traits.name: Devil’s Sight
traits.desc: Magical darkness doesn’t impede the devil’s darkvision.

traits.name: Keen Smell
traits.desc: The devil dog has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
traits.desc: The devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Scent of Prey
traits.desc: The devil dog knows the exact location of any soul whose true name it knows, as long as that soul resides in a vessel or body within 1 mile. If the soul is beyond that distance, it knows the direction the soul lies in. If the soul is on a different plane of existence, it knows the plane that the soul resides on.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 15 Strength saving throw or be knocked prone.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) slashing damage.
